title: [FEATURE] Improve SKVertices API
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Currently `SKVertices` API hides access to specifying vertex/index counts and builder class is not exposed at all.

https://api.skia.org/classSkVertices.html#a526433284b49288ad38cf0f0216fc6f4 - vertex and index counts are not present in the API.
https://api.skia.org/classSkVertices_1_1Builder.html - not exposed

Vertex and index counts are needed when a shared array is used or we want to copy only a subset. This forces user to allocate new arrays frequently since copy start and length can't be controlled.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Binding builder would allow for more efficient vertex buffer construction.

To fix ergonomics of `SKVertices.CreateCopy` it should allow for using spans as well.
So a signature will look like `SKVertices.CreateCopy(SKVertexMode mode, ReadOnlySpan<SKPoint> positions, ...)` which would allow for offseting copy start and controlling length of copied data.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Current API works but is inefficient.
